ref.Programmability.Name: StateUnderProgramMainGoal
ref.Programmability.CreateCommand: CREATE FUNCTION [sbor].[StateUnderProgramMainGoal] (@id int) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT SG.caption AS NumberName--Наименование основной цели ,GI.Caption AS GoalIndicator --Целевые показатели ,UD.Caption AS Measure -- Тип единицы измерения ,CAST(YEAR(HP.DateEnd) AS INT) AS NumYear --Год определенного значения цеелвого показателя ,SPGIV.Value AS GIValue -- значения цеелвого показателя FROM ref.SystemGoal as SG INNER JOIN tp.StateProgram_SystemGoalElement AS SPSGE -- ТЧ «Элементы СЦ» ON SPSGE.idSystemGoal = SG.id INNER JOIN doc.StateProgram AS SP ON SP.id = SPSGE.idOwner INNER JOIN ref.DocType AS DT --поле «Тип утверждающего документа» Подпрограмма ГП ON DT.id = SG.idDocType_CommitDoc LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_GoalIndicator AS SPGI ON SPSGE.id = SPGI.idMaster LEFT JOIN ref.GoalIndicator AS GI ON GI.id = SPGI.idGoalIndicator LEFT JOIN ref.UnitDimension AS UD ON UD.id = GI.idUnitDimension LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_GoalIndicator_Value AS SPGIV ON SPGIV.idMaster = SPGI.id LEFT JOIN ref.HierarchyPeriod AS HP ON HP.id = SPGIV.idHierarchyPeriod WHERE SPSGE.IsMainGoal = 1 -- AND SP.id = @id )
